name: Ricetta: stufato di mele del Nord
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Northern Apple Stew.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Mela
value.desc: Croccante e fragrante. Deliziosa sia cruda che come sidro.

value.name: Burro
value.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

value.name: Pepe
value.desc: Peppery. Cuts through oily flavors and excites the taste buds. Goes best on meat.

value.name: Stufato di mele del Nord
value.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Reward from reaching Reputation Level 1 in Mondstadt</color>
